timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: In this case, I haven't bothered renaming these models / comments since they are slotted for deletion, per above RW-5406.
replies.author: calbach

timeline.bodyText: What is the context for removing this one?
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: It only existed to support mapping between the old and new types, since I temporarily implemented deprecatedLocalize as a shim on top of localize
replies.author: calbach
